cause.description:
Bulembu, a town in Swaziland with heart and vision, is redefining and rebuilding itself. Abandoned by the mining industry, the future looked bleak. The inhabitants deserted the town and left with nothing. In a country further ravaged by AIDS - orphans and babies were impacted daily. But a team of entrepreneurs and social developers see potential in Bulembu and the spirit of the Swazi people.
Today Bulembu has a vision to create a totally self-sustaining community by 2020, restoring health, education, commerce and providing care for the children. Join our journey and breathe life back into the community in Bulembu. For more info go to www.bulembu.org
American donations are received and processed by Partners in Action, then 100% of your gift will be transferred to the Bulembu community. Canadian donations should be given through www.bulembu.org
1. Physical, emotional, and spiritual transformation to those suffering from AIDS, poverty, abuse and abandonment
2. Create a self-sustaining community that will support Bulembu's compassion ministries
3. Care for AIDS Orphans and those orphaned by AIDS
cause.mission: provide safety, dignity and hope to those suffering from AIDS, poverty, abuse and abandonment
cause.name: Bulembu Swaziland
